resources.string: MalWhere is a free malicious link detector, created for research and educational purpose only. Unauthorized reproduction and commercialized distribution of this program, or any part of it , may result in severe civil or criminal penalties due to certain third-party software copyright.

\"By clicking submit report, all information you provided will be preserved as preliminary evidence, to use for the investigation of the reported URL . We assure you this report will be sent to the responsible authority and evidence submitted shall be kept confidential as compliance to the Data Privacy Act of 2012 (RA no. 10173).\"
